text:
Thanks for reading Misty. I think its easier to blame something so concrete as a gadget, whereas distraction and our inner turmoil can be harder to quantify, explain, understand, and change. 

Often, we consider presence and social media mutually exclusive, and I dont think that has to be the case. A raised sense of self-awareness can help with finding the joy in social again, which I feel like a lot of us have lost because of this 24/7 interconnectedness social media companies are aggressively pushing us towards. 

 I'm glad you enjoyed the "What to Do" section, the morning part has helped tremendously, so give it a try, it's so worth it. I've also found that not checking my phone (unless I have to) when I'm walking has helped with being more mindful.
